metadata.title: CVE-2021-25289 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. TiffDecode has a heap-based buffer overflow when decoding crafted YCbCr files because of certain interpretation conflicts with LibTIFF in RGBA mode. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-35654.

criterions.comment: pillow package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.2-1').
